ul.li: Views in Egypt [microform] : from the original drawings in the possession of Sir Robert Ainslie, taken during his embassy to Constantinople by Luigi Mayer / engraved by and under the direction of Thomas Milton ; with historical observations, and incidental illustrations of the manners and customs of the natives of that country.

Views in Egypt, from the original drawings in the possession of Sir Robert Ainslie, taken during his embassy to Constantinople, by Luigi Mayer. Engraved by and under the direction of Thomas Milton. With historical observations, and incidental illustrations, of the manners and customs of the natives of that country.

Views in Palestine [microform] : from the original drawings of Luigi Mayer : with an historical and descriptive account of the country, and its remarkable places = Vues en Palestine : d'apr√®s les dessins originaux de Luigi Mayer : avec une relation historique et descriptive du pay et des lieux principaux qu'on y remarque.

Views in the Ottoman empire [microform] : chiefly in Caramania, a part of Asia Minor hitherto unexplored : with some curious selections from the islands of Rhodes and Cyprus, and the celebrated cities of Corinth, Carthage, and Tripoli : from the original drawings in the possession of Sir R. Ainslie, taken during his embassy to Constantinople by Luigi Mayer : with historical observations and incidental illustrations of the manners and customs of the natives of the country.

Views in the Ottoman empire, chiefly in Caramania, a part of Asia Minor hitherto unexplored; with some curious selections from the islands of Rhodes and Cyprus, and the celebrated cities of Corinth, Carthage, and Tripoli: from the original drawings in the possession of Sir R. Ainslie, taken during his embassy to Constantinople, by Luigi Mayer: with historical observations and incidental illustrations of the manners and customs of the natives of the country.
